name: baldness
content:
baldness noun [U]
(HAIR LOSS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the condition of having little or no hair on the head: He suffered from premature baldness, losing his hair in his twenties. There is no cure for baldness.
alvarez/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesHe was convicted for false claims he made about the effectiveness of a treatment for baldness.In humans, male baldness is associated with high testosterone levels.a thick, solid man whose baldness makes him look older than he isShe is wearing a floral hat that barely covers her baldness.

baldness noun [U]
(DIRECTNESS)
the quality of being very direct, with no unnecessary words or no attempt to be more polite or less shocking: The baldness of her question shocked him.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is the baldness of her statement that disturbs me.The comment shocked listeners with its baldness.I was surprised by the description. I didn't expect such baldness.
